AutoResponse.Title: CWE 73
AutoResponse.Response: To remeidate this flaw you must validate the user input before creating the File object. We would recommend you use our custom cleanser for this which is on the internal NuGet called "VeraCleanse". If you need help please to Bill in IT Security.

AutoResponse.Title: CWE 259
AutoResponse.Response: If this is not a hardcoded password but a reference to an external configuration or flat file, please raise a "mitigate by design" within the Veracode portal. Please describe how this file is controlled in a production environment, including the contact of the support team.

PropertyConditions.ActionToTake: Potential False Positive, Mitigate or Fix
